com.bot.worker.config

Class ConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bot.worker.EventBusComponent
      • com.bot.worker.config.ConfigLoader

  • @Singleton
public class ConfigLoader
extends EventBusComponent
    Loads task configs from configuration file Initial config loading happens on receiving AppInitEvent

    Config example <config> <group id="GitHub.com"> <task id="gitHubPing" executor="PING"> <run>10</run> <deadline>3</deadline> </task> <task id="gitHubTrace" executor="TRACE"> <run>30</run> <deadline>10</deadline> </task> </group> <task id="Java.com" executor="CUSTOM_EX"> <run>2</run> <deadline>1</deadline> <executorConfig> <property key="key">value</property> </executorConfig> </task> <task id="runOnce" executor="CUSTOM_ONE_RUN"> <run>-1</run> </task> </config>

    All communication with other app components goes through the event bus, look EventBusComponent for more info

    Author:
    Aleks

             throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,

        Handler for task config RELOAD requests
        Parameters:
        reloadEvent - events with task name to RELOAD
        Throws:
